languages.text: "Прошу прощения. Это не было знаком неуважения к вашей персоне. Позвольте мне это доказать".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу прощения. Это не было знаком неуважения к вашей персоне. Позвольте мне это доказать".

languages.text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения. Это не было знаком неуважения к вашей персоне. Позвольте мне это доказать".

traits.locale_text: "My apologies. This wasn't meant to be a sign of disrespect toward your person. Please allow me to prove it."
"My apologies. This wasn't meant to be a sign of disrespect toward your person. Please allow me to prove it."
"My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."
"My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."
"My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

languages.text: 「申し訳ない。あなたのような尊重すべき人物を軽視する意図は全くないのだ。証明させてくれ」
languages.original_text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ない。あなたのような尊重すべき人物を軽視する意図は全くないのだ。証明させてくれ」

languages.text: “我很抱歉。我绝对没有打算对您这样的贵客不敬，请允许我证明给您看吧。”
languages.original_text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉。我绝对没有打算对您这样的贵客不敬，请允许我证明给您看吧。”

languages.text: «Disculpe. No pretendía faltarle el respeto a su venerable figura. Le ruego que me permita demostrárselo».
languages.original_text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

traits.locale_text: «Disculpe. No pretendía faltarle el respeto a su venerable figura. Le ruego que me permita demostrárselo».

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses. Je n'avais pas l'intention de manquer de respect à un personnage de votre rang. Laissez-moi vous le prouver. »
languages.original_text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses. Je n'avais pas l'intention de manquer de respect à un personnage de votre rang. Laissez-moi vous le prouver. »

languages.text: "Verzeiht. Es war keine Respektlosigkeit Eurer geschätzten Person gegenüber. Bitte gestattet mir, dafür den Beweis anzutreten."
languages.original_text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht. Es war keine Respektlosigkeit Eurer geschätzten Person gegenüber. Bitte gestattet mir, dafür den Beweis anzutreten."

languages.text: "Bağışlayın. Niyetim, saygın şahsiyetinize hürmetsizlik etmek değildi. İzin verin kendimi affettireyim."
languages.original_text: "My apologies. It was no sign of disrespect toward your esteemed personage. Please allow me to prove it."

traits.locale_text: "Bağışlayın. Saygın şahsiyetinize hürmetsizlik etmek değildi niyetim. İzin verin kendimi affettireyim."
